title: Ep. 593 - Biden Forgets His Cognitive Decline
description:
Joe Biden forgets his cognitive decline, Oprah Winfrey makes a shocking statement, and a celebrity is forced to apologize for a joke when she was nine years old.

Get your copy of "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" here: https://utm.io/uHjW
